Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scarab
Description: Well-fashioned scarab found near the arms of an adult. Anatomical details are succinct: head and clypeus, jagged legs. The flat surface bears a design common during the Middle Kingdom: the signs Nefer-Re ("Re is perfect") surrounded by a flat spiral.
